fields.summary: Enable the configuration: yarn.nodemanager.log-container-debug-info.enabled by default in yarn-default.xml

comments.body:
This started failing after YARN-7381.  I'm guessing the new debugging logic added to the container launch script by default is messing up the unit test somehow.

[~xgong] [~leftnoteasy] could you take a look?
Rather than trying to rework this test to fit what the debug code expects, I took the easy path by having this one test turn off the debug logging code.
